items.name: Button Fern
items.description: A small, charming fern with button-like leaves. Ideal for indoor air purification.

items.name: Clinton's Woodfern
items.description: A tall, elegant fern that thrives in moist, shaded gardens. Excellent for lush greenery.

items.name: Smallstalk Necklace Fern
items.description: Delicate fern with trailing fronds like a necklace. Perfect for hanging pots.

items.name: Southern California Draba
items.description: A tiny, fragrant wildflower from California. Adds a soft aroma to rocky gardens.

items.name: Johnny-nip
items.description: Herbal plant with aromatic leaves. Traditionally used for its pleasant scent.

items.name: Harvestbells
items.description: Vibrant purple flowers with a sweet, light fragrance. Attracts butterflies.

items.name: Lake Huron Tansy
items.description: A hardy coastal plant with yellow blooms. Grows well near water edges.

items.name: Pondweed
items.description: Submerged aquatic plant that oxygenates ponds. Provides shelter for fish.

items.name: Blue Boneset
items.description: Produces clusters of soft blue flowers. A beautiful addition to garden borders.

items.name: Lellingeria
items.description: A rare fern with graceful, feathery fronds. Grows well in humid environments.

items.name: Cynodon
items.description: Commonly known as Bermuda grass. Durable and ideal for ornamental lawns.

items.name: Columbian Onion
items.description: A bulb plant with pink blooms. Native to the Pacific Northwest.

items.name: Geyer's Onion
items.description: Produces delicate purple flowers. A hardy ornamental bulb species.

items.name: Gregg's Saddlebush
items.description: Shrubby plant with silver-green leaves. Attracts bees and hummingbirds.

items.name: Oracle Oak
items.description: A rare hybrid oak known for its resilience. Features deep green, glossy leaves.

items.name: Prickly Hound's Tongue
items.description: Wild plant with rough leaves and small purple flowers. Prefers dry soils.

items.name: Glacier Avens
items.description: Alpine flower with yellow petals. Grows in rocky, high-altitude areas.

items.name: Strigose Beard Lichen
items.description: Soft, hanging lichen found on trees. Indicator of clean air environments.

items.name: Tanoak
items.description: Evergreen tree with leathery leaves and acorn-like fruits. Native to California.
